description.specialization: Scalable analytics platforms and data pipelines
description.expertise: Senior Data & Cloud Engineer with expertise in cloud engineering (AWS, Azure) and enterprise data architecture

experiences.description: Led multiple server migration projects from on-premises to AWS cloud, including application re-architecture, data migration, and infrastructure optimization reducing operational costs by 30%. Implement monitoring and alerting systems for cloud resources, ensuring 99.9% uptime. Develop Python scripts using Cursor and Claude for building full-stack applications and Tableau automation, leveraging REST APIs. Deploy cloud infrastructure on AWS using EC2, S3, Lambda, and ECS. Develop ETL pipelines using Azure Data Factory and AWS Lambda for automated data ingestion, transformation, and loading across multi-cloud environments.

Developed 20+ Tableau and Power BI dashboards tracking finance, operations, and workforce analytics KPIs, supporting data-driven decisions for senior leadership. Optimized complex SQL queries and stored procedures in Azure SQL, reducing report generation time by 40%. Implemented comprehensive data validation and reconciliation processes across multiple source systems, ensuring 99.9% data accuracy in enterprise reporting. Served as subject matter expert (SME) for BI reporting, providing technical guidance, conducting user training sessions, and managing enhancement requests.

Gathered and documented detailed business requirements for analytics solutions, creating functional specifications and process flow diagrams for development teams. Built automated MIS reporting systems using Advanced Excel, VBA macros, and SQL queries, reducing manual reporting effort by 60%. Facilitated stakeholder workshops and requirement elicitation sessions, ensuring alignment between business needs and technical solutions. Prepared executive dashboards and presentations for C-level stakeholders, translating complex data insights into actionable business recommendations.

projects.name: Corebridge Financial Analytics
projects.description: Served as Analytics Engineer for Corebridge consulting. Managed user provisioning, server performance, and content governance. Built automated Python workflows for data refresh and compliance reporting on AWS.

projects.name: Bain Data & Consulting Analytics
projects.description: Built enterprise analytics solutions for Bain & Co. consulting engagements. Developed AWS-hosted data pipelines and Python automation for client deliverables, enabling data-driven strategic recommendations.

projects.name: Cloud Analytics Migration
projects.description: Migrated on-premise analytics to AWS cloud. Automated infrastructure provisioning and data workflows using Python scripts and AWS Lambda. Built and tested REST APIs with Postman for data integration, reducing manual overhead by 60%.

projects.name: UKG Center of Excellence
projects.description: Part of Center of Excellence team building enterprise dashboards for workforce analytics. Developed reporting solutions integrating Salesforce and Snowflake data, hosted on on-premise servers.

projects.name: Neo Analytics Platform
projects.description: Optimized lending analytics platform hosted on AWS. Built Python automation for data quality checks and implemented secure dealer-level data segregation across 15 dashboards.

education.degree: PGDBA (Post Graduate Diploma in Business Administration)
